user_account.title: User Account Management
user_account.subtitle: View and edit user information, manage roles and permissions.

actions.title: Administrative Actions
actions.description: Manage account status and user security
actions.block_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to block this account?
actions.block_confirm_description: The user will not be able to log in to the system. This action can be reversed later.
actions.unblock_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to unblock this account?
actions.unblock_confirm_description: The user will be able to log in to the system again and use the application.
actions.reset_confirm_description: A password reset link will be sent to the user's email address. Do you want to continue?
actions.cannot_block_self: You cannot block your own account
actions.self_edit_description: You are viewing your own account. For security reasons, some actions are restricted.

roles.title: User Roles
roles.description: Manage user permissions by assigning roles
roles.add_role_description: Are you sure you want to add the {{role}} role for this user? This will grant additional permissions.
roles.remove_role_description: Are you sure you want to remove the {{role}} role for this user? This will revoke some permissions.
roles.client_dietician_conflict: A user cannot be both a Client and a Dietician. Remove the Dietician role first.
roles.dietician_client_conflict: A user cannot be both a Dietician and a Client. Remove the Client role first.
roles.cannot_modify_own_roles: You cannot modify your own roles
roles.self_edit_description: You are viewing your own account. For security reasons, you cannot modify your own roles.

forms.first_name_min: First name must have at least 2 characters
forms.first_name_max: First name cannot have more than 30 characters
forms.last_name_min: Last name must have at least 2 characters
forms.last_name_max: Last name cannot have more than 30 characters
forms.confirm_data_change_description: Are you sure you want to change the user's personal data? This operation will update the first and last name in the system.
forms.confirm_email_change_description: Are you sure you want to change the user's email address to {{email}}? The user will need to use the new email address to log in.

toasts.email_in_use: This email address is already in use by another user. Please choose a different email address.
toasts.email_change_error: An error occurred while changing the email address. Please try again later.
toasts.user_no_role: User does not have the role {{role}}.

home.title: Your personalized path to better health
home.info:
In the Dietetycy XXI wieku application, we connect you with professional
          dietitians who will prepare an individual nutrition plan for you
          tailored to your needs, goals and lifestyle.
home.role_info: What can a client do and what can a dietitian do?
home.client_description:
For those looking for nutritional advice and meal
                planning
home.client_survey_info: Provide your parameters and habits to receive a personalized diet
home.client_stats_info: Monitor changes in your weight, body composition and diet effects
home.client_review: Evaluation of the received dietary profile
home.client_review_info: Express your opinion about the diet and help improve it
home.client_access_plans_info: Use dietary profiles prepared especially for you
home.client_view_results_info: Check what your test results say and how they affect your diet
home.client_notifications_info: Don’t forget about tests and upcoming surveys
home.dietitian_description: For nutrition specialists managing clients and providing guidance
home.dietitian_manage_clients_info: Browse, filter, and choose the people you work with
home.dietitian_analyze_surveys_info: Assess client responses and build their dietary profile
home.dietitian_assign_plans_info: Design personalized plans tailored to client needs
home.dietitian_lab_analysis_info: Help clients understand their results and implement proper changes
home.dietitian_feedback_info: Collect feedback and improve your approach
home.dietitian_reminders_info: Encourage clients to take regular measurements and update their data
home.why_1_title: A personalized diet tailored to you
home.why_1_desc: Your needs are unique — your meal plan should be too. A dietitian analyzes your lifestyle, goals, and preferences to create a plan that truly works.
home.why_2_desc: Cholesterol, blood sugar, blood pressure — a well-matched diet can support your body in addressing common health issues.
home.why_3_desc: With the help of a dietitian, you'll learn how to compose meals, read labels, and avoid nutritional traps.
home.why_4_title: A diet aligned with your values
home.why_4_desc: Vegan? Keto? Gluten-free? Or a diet for Hashimoto’s? Dietitians consider both your medical needs and personal beliefs.
home.why_5_desc: The right nutrients benefit not just your body, but also your mind. Feel the difference just days after switching to healthy eating.

login.too_long: Username must be at most 50 characters

error.emailExist: This email is already in use. Try using different email address.
error.loginExist: This username is already in use. Try using different username.
error.passwordRegex: Password must include at least: 1 lower case letter, 1 upper case letter, 1 number and 1 special character.

error.unauthorized: You must be logged in to execute this action.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Try again later.

unauthorized.cardDescription: You need to have specific role to access this part of Dietetycy XXI wieku.
unauthorized.paragraph: Track your meals, monitor nutrition, and achieve your health goals with personalized diet plans.

exceptions.account_has_no_roles: The account has no assigned roles
exceptions.account_not_verified: The account has not been verified

exceptions.concurrent_update: The resource was modified by someone else. Please refresh.
exceptions.excessive_login_attempts: Too many failed login attempts. Account is temporarily blocked.
exceptions.role_conflict: Role conflict. User cannot be both a Client and a Dietician.
exceptions.self_role_assignment: You cannot assign roles to yourself
exceptions.previous_password_used: The new password cannot be the same as the previous password
